Package com.sun.tools.visualvm.jmx

JMX connections support in VisualVM.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CredentialsProvider
    EnvironmentProvider adding the JMXConnector.CREDENTIALS property to the JMX environment map.
    CredentialsProvider.Custom
    CredentialsProvider to provide custom settings.
    CredentialsProvider.Persistent
    CredentialsProvider to provide custom settings.
    DefaultCustomizer
    JmxConnectionCustomizer providing the default JMX Connection dialog to enter JMX connection url and optional credentials.
    DefaultCustomizer.CustomizerUI
    Implementation of PropertiesPanel for entering the JMX url, optional credentials and selecting whether the credentials should be persistent or transient.
    DefaultCustomizer.PropertiesUI
    Implementation of PropertiesPanel for viewing the JMX connection properties defined when creating the connection.
    EnvironmentProvider
    Provider of the JMX environment for each JMX connection.
    JmxApplicationsSupport
    Support for creating JMX applications in VisualVM.
    JmxConnectionCustomizer
    Provider of a special JMX connection type.
    JmxConnectionCustomizer.Setup
    Setup based on the user-provided settings in the Panel defining the JMX connection to be created.
    JmxConnectionSupport
    Support for customizing JMX connections in VisualVM.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JmxApplicationException
    Exception being thrown when creating new JMX Application fails.

Package com.sun.tools.visualvm.jmx Description

JMX connections support in VisualVM.
